name: Historically Accurate Space Race
description:
This game is made for the Historically Accurate Game Jam 3 with the theme 'Cold War' and it was made in about 6 days.

In this game, you can choose whether to play with a US or USSR rocket and race to different planets.

Well, it is not how it actually went in the Cold War, I interpreted it in my own way.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows: Move left and right
  • Space: Boost/Shoot

If you like the game you can check out my other games on my itch.io page.

Used some audio from here.
